amendment.description: To authorize a land conveyance, Naval Air Station, Patuxent River, Maryland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3215 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3215 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S5789-5790; text: CR S5790) To authorize a land conveyance, Naval Air Station, Patuxent River, Maryland.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3215 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3215 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes.
